channel.title: Npc question (pi)
channel.description: How do i make it so when you kill a certain amount of npc it will teleport you to a new area were you kill more npc and i was going to make this kinda like a custom minigame where you have to go threw a certain amout of waves of monsters till you get to the boss kinda like jad i guess you could say but how do i do that?
